about_the_game:
■A new chapter of the horror escape game THE JUSOU- School Ghost Story -


THE JUSOU Series, which has become a hot topic with the name of the scariest horror escape game in mobile gaming history, is now available on Steam!

The mobile version has been downloaded over 5 million times worldwide and the fear is spreading!
A new chapter of THE JUSOU series, the most original and chilling horror escape game of all time, has begun and has become a hot topic of discussion around the globe!

Every school has a “ghost story” that has been passed down from generation to generation
Yes ...... The Nest of grievances is here...

Overview
・This is an escape game where you explore each classroom and progress through the story while getting hints and items.
・After clearing this game once, a scenario will be added where you can reach the real truth.
　
Features
・This game is inspired by Japanese horror and is not only scary but also has a memorable story.
*This game contains grotesque representations, including potentially traumatizing horror/scare effects and gory scenes.
*If strange things happen after playing this game, please do so at your own risk.


■■THE JUSOU - School Ghost Story - Prologue ■■

The scenery calls old memory back.

I stop in front of this school which I went to everday until a few years ago.

And there is a obsolete shool building which built more than 80 years ago near by.

As I graduatied, the obsolete buidling had been fobidden to everybody. The staffs has tried to destory it servral times.

However, the same accident occurred every time when people tried to dismantle the obsolete shool building.

Everyone in the accident will be injured their eyes and unable to continue working.

Meanwhile, a rumor began to be whispered by students and residents in the vicinity.

[A ghost of a blinded girl appears!]

She seems to wander around the obsolete school building, groping for something.

if those who enter the school building and meet the ghost, they will have their eyes blinded too.]

When I remember those nostalgic rumors, I feel like that I see a figure in the obsolete school building.

That is so strange!

I can't help to enter that obsolete school building!.

■■■■

Fear is spreading ......
